page.title: 04RECREATION 2
page.content: There is a park in Rotherwick, which includes a cricket pitch, a football pitch and a tennis court.The tennis court can be hired for Â£15 for a years play.The cricket pitch is used nearly every weekend by Rotherwick Cricket Club. They play in a league, and have to travel all over Hampshire. The pavilion they use is about 50 years old. It is made mainly of wood but there is some brick around the base, and the roof is thatched. A groundsman looks after the pitch. In the winter the pitch is used for football, the goals and nets are put up each weekend ready for friendly matches between villages. Most boys like to play football in their spare time and the girls like to go horse riding.
